io.micronaut.core.convert

Interface ArgumentConversionContext<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotationMetadataProvider, AnnotationSource, ConversionContext, ErrorsContext, java.lang.Iterable<ConversionError>, TypeVariableResolver

    public interface ArgumentConversionContext<T>
extends ConversionContext, AnnotationMetadataProvider
    Extended version of the ConversionContext specifically for conversion Argument instances.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
